column1: #Text=It is on no particular street , at no particular corner ; even its habitues , its most enthusiastic devotees , are unable to locate it upon demand .
#Text=It is " over there in the quarter , " " not far from the cathedral there .

#Text= No , no , " murmured Blix , " you ca n't tell .

column1: #Text=" The red-headed one has put his hat on a chair , just behind him , notice ?

#Text= He might have his initials inside the crown , or his whole name even ; and you could see if he had a ' captain ' before it .

#Text= And K. D. B. may come at any moment .
